ml.alternet.security.auth.formats

Class SchemeWithEncoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.security.auth.formats.SchemeWithEncoding

  • public class SchemeWithEncoding
extends Object
    A scheme with encoding, e.g. SSHA.b64 or SSHA.HEX. Works with a scanner in order to let progress the parsing after creating an instance.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    BytesEncoder.hexa, BytesEncoder.base64

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchemeWithEncoding

        public SchemeWithEncoding(Scanner crypt,
                          Predicate<Scanner> schemeStartCondition,
                          char shemeEndChar)
                   throws IOException
        Extract the scheme and encoding if any.
        Parameters:
        crypt - The crypt to parse, wrapped in a scanner.
        schemeStartCondition - Test and consume the characters before the scheme, if necessary.
        shemeEndChar - The character that ends the scheme (not consumed by the scanner).
        Throws:
        IOException - On I/O error.

    • Method Detail

      • code

        public static Optional<String> code(BytesEncoding encoding)
        Return the code for the given encoding.
        Parameters:
        encoding - The encoding.
        Returns:
        "HEX" or "b64" or empty
